case.state: There you are, ~player~... And there's my bridesmaid, too!
There you are! You look beautiful, ~player~.
Hi, I'm Lyndis. You can call me Lyn.
They say it's bad luck to see the bride in her dress before the wedding... But I couldn't miss this for the world!
I am Lyn, of the Lorca tribe. Nice to meet you.
You think you can defeat me? I dislike seeing someone facing such overwhelming odds, but you are welcome to try.
I am from the noble house of Caelin, yet I truly belong to the open plains. Just call me Lyn, all right?
I need to swap out ~cards~ cards.
These ~cards~ are useless to me...
I must get rid of ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~ other cards.
I need ~cards~.
These are silky smooth and comfortable, just like my gloves. How about yours, Florina?
Will you go with us when we visit my grandfather at Caelin, Florina? You know, after losing this game!
Get used to this, ~player~. We'll be playing this game more often once we get married... You're welcome to join us anytime, Florina!
No wonder why Sain never stopped talking about this "card game" he liked so much. Did he ever invite you to play, Florina?
These are silky smooth and comfortable, just like my gloves.
Will we visit my grandfather in Caelin? Just don't tell him about this game, and how I beat you in it!
You are not going to see me stripping, ~player~. You'll just have to wait until our wedding night.
Get used to this, ~player~. We'll be playing this game more often once we get married.
No wonder why Sain never stopped talking about this "card game" he liked so much. I told you about Sain, right, sweetie?
This dress has a lot of accessories... Just ask Florina. She helped me get into this thing.
These look good... Just like my groom! Wouldn't you agree, Florina?
These look good... Just like my fiance! Wouldn't you agree, Florina?
This dress has a lot of accessories. I hope you aren't running out of patience.
These look good... Just like my groom!
These look good... Just like my fiance!
I hope you aren't looking at me with lustful eyes... except for you, ~player~. Your eyes are so beautiful.
These cards are great, but they are not the reason why I'm so happy. Florina is here! ... I'm joking, my love. I'm happy I have the two most important people with me tonight.
I kinda wish I had a worse hand. These shoes are killing me!
These cards are great, but they are not the reason why I'm so happy.
Looks like I've been blessed by St. Elimine herself.
If I understand correctly, my chances of winning this are fairly high!
Good luck trying to get me out of this dress in this game! Don't worry, ~player~. You will see what's underneath eventually... And, well, I've shared everything with Florina already...
I have health, a place to call home, the best possible friend in all Elibe, an attractive bride, and great cards. I'm so blessed!
I have health, a place to call home, an attractive bride, and great cards. I'm so blessed!
I have health, a place to call home, the best possible friend in all Elibe, an attractive groom, and great cards. I'm so blessed!
I have health, a place to call home, an attractive groom, and great cards. I'm so blessed!
Good luck trying to get me out of this dress in this game! Don't worry, ~player~. You will see what's underneath eventually.
You should start thinking about what you're going to take off, 'cause I'm not losing this one!
I am quite happy with these specific cards.
This is great.
That's just what I wanted!
Saved for now.
Luck is kind to me.
The winds of my homeland have blessed me today...
These are as lovely as Nils and Ninian's dances.
These are as lovely as Nils and Ninian's dances. Remember when they tried to teach us how to dance, Florina?
Just what I needed!
I can definitely win with these cards!
I could play these cards all day.
I'm going to win this hand. You better prepare yourself.
You probably aren't going to like this, but... I have a great hand.
Knowing that you aren't going to lose is a nice feeling.
These are a relief...
Yes!... I'm sorry, I forgot my poker face.
Looks like I'm safe.
I don't see how can I lose with this hand.
I am not showing my underwear for now.
Don't worry, ~player~. I'll stay clothed for the remainder of the game, but you'll still see me at our wedding night, so it evens out!
I'm not showing anything else... for now.
Not even ~player~ can defeat these.
You are welcome to try, but I don't see any way I could lose.
Looks like my girls are protected for now.
Wanna see my breasts? Well, it looks like you have to keep waiting.
I'm feeling as nice as when Serra or Priscilla heals me using their staves.
I thought for a second that the dealer wanted me to get naked. Finally, some good cards!
I'm positive I won't be the one losing this turn. Start analyzing your options.
At least this hand will prevent you from seeing my Sacaen plains.
Luck is on my side once again!
I can rely on these to get me to safety.
I was a bit nervous, I admit it! But these cards are great!
I can still win this. I will win this!
It seems that you'll have to wait for the next hand if you want to see me lose.
I will always be your friend, Florina. No matter what happens!
I'm sure someone else is going to lose this hand. Am I gonna watch my darling strip? ...Or maybe Florina?
I didn’t know you were afraid of bees, Florina. I thought you loved all animals.
I hope Huey's doing okay, Florina. He's such a sweet Pegasus...
I'm sure someone else is going to lose this hand. Am I gonna watch my darling strip?
These are okay. How about you, ~player~? Will I be getting a preview of our wedding night anytime soon? Don't mind Florina, She's shy around men.
I'd like to hold on to this bouquet as long as possible. Isn't it beautiful, Florina?
I'd like to hold on to this bouquet as long as possible.
These are okay. How about you, ~player~? Will I be getting a preview of our wedding night anytime soon?
I'm sure I'll be fine. I'm with you, aren't I?
I'm sure I'll be fine. I have the two most important people in my life here.
Hmmm... Can I show my future wife my hand? ... Or maybe Florina?
Hmmm ... Can I show my future wife my hand?
Hmmm... Can I show my future husband my hand?... Or maybe Florina?
Hmmm ... Can I show my future husband my hand?
Don't expect me to lose anything, ~player~. I'm doing just fine. I hope you're doing well too, Florina.
Don't expect me to lose anything, ~player~. I'm doing just fine.
You know, this isn't so bad. I'm fairly certain I won't be removing my gloves. Unless you want me to, dear.
I'm comfortable with these. (I hope Florina is doing okay...)
We are counting this as your bachelorette party, right?
We are counting this as your bachelor party, right?
I'm comfortable with these.
I don't see any trouble with these.
Decent.
Average.
Not great, not awful.
I guess that's enough.
This isn't that bad.
If you want to defeat me, you'll have to prove your worth.
If you want to defeat me, you'll have to prove your worth and go through both of us. Florina, are you ready?
Not the greatest hand in history, but I should be okay.
My boots will stay with me.
Hmm... This could be as tricky as that time when we faced a magic seal.
Whew! I think this could have been much worse.
I'm fine. How about you, ~player~?
Hmm... This could be as tricky as that time when we faced a magic seal. You were invaluable to us that day, Florina. You and your sister.
I'm fine. How about you, Florina?
By the look on your faces, this could be worse.
Let's see how these hold up...
I'm confident in my skills and these aren't that bad.
How are you doing out there, ~player~?
I don't see myself losing with these.
How are you doing out there, ~player~? And you, Florina?
I've faced far crueler odds on the battlefield. I'll be fine!
It'd be incredibly unlucky for me to lose with these.
I guess you can try to beat these, if you dare.
I can survive.
I just hope someone else has worse cards...
Good enough! Show me what you have!
I probably won't have to show off my breasts with these cards...
There's certainly a chance that I'll survive this...
It looks like you'll be still looking at my panties next turn.
You'll have to do better than that if you want to defeat me.
I'd have to be really unlucky to lose with these cards.
Here's hoping this is enough.
I can't give up hope... not now...
I can't concentrate when I'm dressed like this...
I can still control my fate.
A fighting chance!
I won't back down.
This is not a time for doubt. I can make it work with this set...
You really want me to t-touch myself in front of everyone here, my love? Well, aren't you kinky? Not gonna happen, though.
Looks like my luck stat is running low.
I sure could use a Goddess Icon now.
I sense the dealer also wants to see what's underneath my dress. Luckily, ~player~ isn't exactly the jealous type.
I'm gonna miss my bouquet. I'm glad you're here supporting me, Florina.
I am supposed to throw my bouquet anyways. I hope you grab it, Florina!
I'm gonna miss my bouquet.
I am supposed to throw my bouquet anyway.
I am blessed in many ways. What's a bad set of cards compared to that, huh?
You know, after surviving Nergal and the dragons, a bad hand at poker doesn't seem so bad. Especially since you and Florina are here with me.
I sure could use Mark's help with this hand... Mark was my tactician, nothing more. Florina, can you talk some sense out of ~player~. She's being unreasonable.
I sure could use Mark's help with this hand... Mark was my tactician, nothing more. Florina, can you talk some sense out of ~player~? He's being unreasonable.
You know, after surviving Nergal and the dragons, a bad hand at poker doesn't seem so bad. Especially since you're here with me, ~player~.
I sure could use Mark's help with this hand... Mark was my tactician, nothing more. Jealous isn't a good look for you, dear.
Losing my gloves isn't that bad.
~player~? What an odd-sounding name... But pay me no mind. It is a good name.
This is weak.
Yahoo! My hand's great! (I hope this bluff works...)
I might want to use a strategy guide next time...
Okay Lyn, remember Hector's advice: don't show with your face how poor your hand is.
It's hard to imagine getting a worse hand.
I've overcome bigger adversities.
I wasn't expecting these cards! I probably need to think what to take off next. Any suggestions?
One moment, please. I'm thinking...
We've overcome bigger adversities. Right, Florina?
There might not be a way out of this.
I just can't see a way of winning with these cards.
I might as well start taking my shoes off now, huh...? No, Lyn, it's not over 'til it's over!
These cards are... well, let's just say that I can live without these shoes.
These cards could use a vulnerary.
This is quite concerning...
This is worrisome...
You may see more of me fairly soon.
These cards caught me off guard!
I don't see a way out of this one. I have to try, though!
Whoever shuffled this deck, I will cut you down!
If you're playing to see me without clothes, you may be in luck.
(I guess I can try to bluff my way out of this...) I've been blessed with such a great hand!
My father’s name was Hassar, chieftain of the Lorca. My mother was... Madelyn. I was raised on the plains.
What would you like me to lose next, dear? ... What about you, Florina?
What would you like me to lose next, dear? ... You dirty girl!
What would you like me to lose next, dear? ... You dirty boy!
These odds are overwhelmingly bad, but I won't retreat... not if you're here with me, ~player~.
This is not good. I mean, if I lose, you'll see my... Do I really have to...?
I never thought I'd be in this predicament when you invited me to play this game, ~player~.
Uhhhm... Did I shave...?
I guess you'll get a preview of our wedding night.
This is gonna be embarrassing. I'm glad you're here with me, ~player~.
This doesn't look good at all.
Dang! This is bad.
Alright, dealer, I can take a hint!
C'mon. These cards are awful.
I think my HP will reach 0 after this hand.
I have to prepare myself for defeat...
... I don't believe in bad luck...
... Someone is getting lucky tonight.
I'm not removing my necklace anytime soon. It was a gift from this lovely guy.
Why am I getting cards again... Right! The forfeit rule.
Me? I... I mustn't worry.
Oh, I need to...? Okay, I can do this.
You better not be messing with the cards, ~player~! I trust you, you know?
Oh, my! These cards weren't good enough?
Stay calm, Lyn... You still got this.
I suppose... you'll be seeing even more of me.
A-again?
Oh!
Did I really lose this one? A-are your cards better than mine too, hon?
H-honey, can you help me out here...?
I... didn't think you'd get this far!
It's nice to make your acquaintance, My lady. The Kokori Forest? I am afraid I've never been there.
~Player~, would you share your story with me?
Only sound advice from my tactician so far. I'm not worried.
A tiny detour on my winning road.
So far, so good.
A small setback.
Luckily, you are in a far worse condition than me.
I'm not worried. Victory is still within reach.
You look so cute naked that I thought I might lose something, too.
Looks like my winning streak is over.
I lost the round, but I'm still ahead.
It is time.
I guess it's time for you to see me without clothes for a change.
I don't mind getting exposed a bit, as long as I still win.
It's my time to join you all.
It's nice to make your acquaintance, My lady. The Kokori Forest? I am afraid I've never been there.
~Player~, would you share your story with me?
Is it going to be this close until the end?
Defeated. Still have plenty of HP though.
Is it my turn?
It seems our forces are even.
I knew I had to lose at some point, but still...
Ah! You got me...
I know it's my turn... Think, Lyn, think!
Well, this is awkward.
Good work, Lyn.
~player~, I’m glad you’re here to calm me down. Thank you.
So, I have to show them...
Prepare for what you've been waiting for.
Lord Athos, please call a spell and grant me some more clothes.
It's nice to make your acquaintance, My lady. The Kokori Forest? I am afraid I've never been there.
~Player~, would you share your story with me?
Hmm... Okay.
Not the greatest of starts.
It’s too early to give up!
This battle is far from over.
It seems a tough battle is ahead of me, but I will not lose faith.
Not again!
There's still a lot of fighting spirit in me.
You're supposed to lose some hands too, you know?
Underestimate me, and you’ll end up you regretting it! Now come, if you’ve the nerve!
Nergal must be messing with me.
My doubts have been my undoing...
This is NOT what I expected when you invited me.
There’s nothing to be gained by worrying.
This has gone out of hand...! But I will persevere.
I almost feel bad about how expensive these gloves were. I don't care about fancy clothing. I only care about Florina and you, ~player~.
I caught Hector staring at my ears. He must have a weird fascination with ears. Maybe you know a bit about that, Florina.
Can you give me a hand, Florina?
You want to know what I'm wearing underneath my dress? What do you think? Don't spoil the surprise, Florina!
These flowers are lovely, ~player~. I appreciate the thought. Don't worry, Florina. There aren't any bees in them. I double checked.
It is magical. It's also sacred. I'm very lucky to call it my sword.
It's nice to meet you, too.
Don’t worry about it too much, Florina. I’ll get it back after the game's over.
If you think your bullets are a match to the blessed edge of my Mani Katti you're the dumb bitch, then. I could cut you down before you blink, but I won't. Consider yourself warned, though.
These flowers are lovely, ~player~. I appreciate the thought. The smell reminds me of the plains.
You weren't really expecting I was wielding Manni Katti underneath this dress, were you?
I almost feel bad about how expensive these gloves were. I don't care about fancy clothing. I only care about you, ~player~.
After all the scratches and bruises on my arms and hands, these feel really nice!
Holding hands with you will feel more natural without the gloves anyways.
One moment, please...
My grandfather gave me these earrings. He said they were from mother.
Aren't these earrings beautiful? They were a gift from my grandfather.
These shoes are really fancy... I still like my boots better.
When you grow up surrounded by a sea of grass, shoes become inessential.
I have to admit that these shoes feel quite nice!
Alright... Let me just undo these knots...
Honey, can you help me out here?
You finally got me out of my dress... Congratulations!
You want to know what I'm wearing underneath my dress? What do you think?
I'm on it... one second, please. This isn't as easy as it looks.
You can give me a hand, ~player~, if you'd like.
I was hoping you'd take these off for me. But I can wait until our wedding night...
I almost forgot I had these...
... A pair of exposed legs coming right up.
You weren't really expecting I'd remove my panties before my stockings, right?
♫ Here comes the bride... she's clothed in white... ♪
Is this what you wanted, my love?
I don't feel too bad about this. I think it's because you're by my side, honey.
Blessed Manni Katti, I'll come back for you.
My gloves should suffice.
I think I could live without my belt.
My boots are coming off then.
Time for you to see my feet.
You're in luck, 'cause I'm going to show you something very few people have seen.
No more tricks.
I have no other course of action.
(sigh) Okay Lyn, just close your eyes and pretend you're alone.
Mother and Father were slain last year by brigands. I... I was the only survivor. I lived on, but...
And off they go...
I wonder if Kent ever dreamt about this.
Ah! Are you mocking me, ~player~?
Mmm... I am not sure the rules allow that. But I'll let you spank me if I can spank you later.
Now that my hands are bare, I can hold hands with both of you at once!
Don't play dumb with me, Florina. I know about you and Hector. ♫ Hector and Florina were sitting in a tree... ♫
You may kiss the bride. Kiss me, you fool! You don't want Florina to take your place, do you? Wait, do you...?
Well... I hope you have a decent enough memory. Because unless your name is ~player~, you will never see this again.
See anything you like, ~player~? ... Aww, that's so sweet!
It was only a matter of time before you'd see my bare breasts, ~player~... You'll have to wait until our wedding night to lay your hands on them, though.
Name the time and the place and we can spar. Someday you will be a renowned swordfighter. I must see you... stronger. I will wait for that time with much anticipation.
Thanks, Twilight!
I always wear underwear, silly. Imagine if a draft of wind were to lift my dress during battle... That’d be embarrassing!
Florina, can you make sure the flowers don't wither?
Hold my hands now, sweetie.
The flowers were beautiful, but I don't need them if you're here with me.
You wanted to see more, my love? Don't worry, you will...
You've seen my naked hands now. Exciting, huh?
I learnt a few tricks with my hands lately... You don't believe me? Well, guess I'll have to show you on our wedding night...
I'm ready... Why are you staring at me like that?
Oh, don't be upset, ~player~. You know you will see all of me in private.
That was no easy feat, let me tell you. I can barely move with this dress.
I could really use a foot massage. You know how much I like those!
Well... you weren't really expecting me to take off my dress already, were you?
You may kiss the bride. Kiss me, you fool!
You may kiss the bride. That's your cue to kiss me, you doofus!
Well... these are my exposed legs. You like them, love?
Well... these are my exposed legs. You can stare at them if you'd like, dear.
Those stockings were so comfy... I can imagine that a woman would get used to wearing them on a regular basis.
Well... these are my exposed legs. Careful, they're much stronger than they look. I could easily choke you with them... You wouldn't want that... right, my love?
You like what you see, ~player~? Just wait until our wedding night...
I guess you can show off your beautiful wife-to-be to these people. I don't care... Only you can have me, anyway.
Your wish just got granted, huh?
Well... this is me...
The bond between Manni Katti and myself is unique. Even if you try, you won't be able to wield it.
The Mani Katti is a sacred blade, under divine protection. Only I can wield it.
I will not let my guard down again. [----- Your support level has grown to C -----]
I may be running out of accessories.
If you think I'm defeated, I will prove you wrong.
I feel more comfortable in my bare feet, so I'm okay with this.
How do you like my hair this way?
Do you like my hair like this?
Hope you like the view, because this is it. I will not lose again.
I will win. I have to.
I did not want to show you my breasts, but cards have been dreadful.
I wonder what Sain would say...
Why are you staring at me?
At the very least you should compliment my bare breasts.
I wonder what Hector would say...
Not even Rath can save me now.
What do you mean, the game isn't over? [----- Your support level has grown to B -----]
Well, do you like it? [----- Your support level has grown to B -----]
Please don't look at my butt. It's too... embarrassing. [----- Your support level has grown to B -----]
I will persevere! You will never break my spirit! [----- Your support level has grown to B -----]
I can overcome anything. You’ll see. I am strong. [----- Your support level has grown to B -----]
Everything’s going to be fine. As long as you’re with me, you’ll be safe.
This is a good way to start.
Okay, ~name~. Show us what you have.
All right! ~name~, let's see what you got!
Ha ha, you are so odd, ~player~.
It's ~name~'s turn!
I'm happy it's your turn, ~name~.
Show me you're worthy of my trust, ~name~.
Interesting...
Sorry, ~name~. Your turn now.
You might want to reconsider your strategy, ~name~.
Thanks to St. Elimine, you lost, ~name~, and not me.
You are the reason why I get to keep my dress on, so thank you, ~name~.
Your loss has protected my dignity for the time being, ~name~. So thank you.
Yes! ~name~.
Nothing is more important than family. Yet in my heart, the plains still call me... The never-ending oceans of grass... The memory of that scent alone is enough to leave me weak.
I'm just glad it's not me again.
Join me, ~name~.
Hurry up and get naked, ~name~! Join me!
Good, I didn't lose. Now it's time to pay your dues, ~name~.
Alright! Make me forget I'm naked, ~name~.
It's your turn, ~name~.
Help me out, ~name~.
I could... use the visual... aid.
Yes, take it off fast, ~name~.
You’ve held your head high and marched on. Your... Your strength, I admire. Your kindness... I adore.
I am sure you two would have made a the cutest non-verbal couple.
... Not when I have you, ~player~.
I'm intrigued.
All right! ~name~, let's see what you got!
Your turn now.
It's kind of nice knowing I'm not the only one who has to strip.
No excuses, ~name~.
It's so good to see you lose, you should do it more often.
Happy it's you, ~name~.
Interesting...
Thanks to St. Elimine, you lost, ~name~, and not me.
You might want to reconsider your strategy, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~. Your turn now.
Better you than me.
Yes! ~name~.
Phew! My underwear is safe.
I'm just glad it's not me again.
Join me, ~name~.
Good, I didn't lose. Now it's time to pay your dues, ~name~.
I could... use the visual... aid.
This is going to help.
Show us some skin, ~name~.
You lose, ~name~. Show us your goods.
Everything’s going to be fine. As long as you’re with me, you’ll be safe.
Okay. ~name~, show us what you have.
This is a good way to start.
All right! ~name~, let's see what you got!
Ha ha, you are so odd, ~player~.
I'm glad it's you and not me.
I'm happy it's your turn, ~name~.
Show me you're worthy of my trust, ~name~.
Interesting...
Sorry, ~name~. Your turn now.
You might want to reconsider your strategy, ~name~.
Thanks to St. Elimine, you lost, ~name~, and not me.
You are the reason why I get to keep my dress on, so thank you, ~name~.
Your loss has protected my dignity for the time being, ~name~. So thank you.
Yes! ~name~.
Nothing is more important than family. Yet in my heart, the plains still call me... The neverending oceans of grass... The memory of that scent alone is enough to leave me weak.
I'm just glad it's not me again.
Whose turn is it? Not mine, that's for certain!
Join me, ~name~.
It's your turn, ~name~.
Hurry up and get naked, ~name~! Join me and let us compare!
Good, I didn't lose. Now it's time to pay your dues, ~name~.
Alright! Make me forget I'm naked, ~name~.
Yes, take it off fast, ~name~.
Help me out, ~name~.
I could... use the visual... aid.
You’ve held your head high and marched on. Your... Your strength, I admire. Your kindness... I adore.
Florina! You’re no coward. Get back here at once!
Pull yourself together, Florina. Your nerves are clouding your judgment.
I'm facing a princess. I'm honored, my lady.
I had a four of a kind! I wish my luck were always that great.
... Not when I have you, ~player~.
I'm intrigued.
All right! ~name~, let's see what you got!
Your turn now.
It's kind of nice knowing I'm not the only one who has to strip.
No excuses, ~name~.
It's so good to see you lose, you should do it more often.

state.text: I'm glad it's you and not me.

case.state: Interesting...
Thanks to St. Elimine, you lost, ~name~, and not me.
You might want to reconsider your strategy, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~. Your turn now.
You are the reason why I get to keep my dress on, so thank you, ~name~.
Better you than me.
Phew! My underwear is safe.
I'm just glad it's not me again.
I'm saved for now.
Whose turn is it? Not mine, that's for certain!
I'm happy it's not me, but I'm happier you have to get naked, ~name~!
Good, I didn't lose. Now it's time to pay your dues, ~name~.
I could... use the visual... aid.
This is going to help.
Show us some skin, ~name~.
You lose, ~name~. Show us your goods.
Tell me Link, when you say "HYAAA", what exactly do you mean...? is it the name of your sword? Mine is called Manni Katti. Have you ever heard of it?
Oh! ~player~, will you go with me to the Sacaen Plains if I ask you?
Remove it slowly, lad.
Take that off, ~name~.
So, what are you losing now, ~name~?
Show us some skin, ~name~.
So, what will you lose this time, ~name~?
Really? You're taking off your ~clothing~? That's unfair.
Should I watch this?
Color me intrigued.
Are you for real?
Slowly, ~name~, please.
Come on, don't stretch this out even more...
Seriously?
No!!
W-what?
You'll play this farce to the end, won't you, ~name~?
You're joking, right?
That's not helpful at all.
You're doing this on purpose, aren't you?
Okay, ~name~, put on a show for us.
I've been defeated and you still are removing accessories.
Okay, ~name~, lose something good.
Trust me, that won't be the last thing you'll take off, ~name~.
So, only your ~clothing~? That's actually a good strategy, ~name~. I might borrow it later.
I thought you were braver, ~name~.
Really? Is that it?
I have neither pity nor mercy for you.
Is that it?
And I thought Lundgren was a coward.
Get used to it, I'm sure I'll be seeing more from you.
Little by little, my friend.
I was hoping for something bigger than your ~clothing~.
I'm fine with you starting slow.
That was a let-down.
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't expecting something bigger.
Well...I am a patient girl.
Does that even count?
I can't really blame you. I probably would have done the same.
I'm just a little... jealous you still have accessories to spare.
I'm in my underwear and you're taking off your ~clothing~...
Your ~clothing~?
I will cut you down!
My breasts are on display and you're just taking off your ~clothing~? You'll pay for that.
I'm butt naked here and you're still removing accessories? Not fun, ~name~.

case.state: All eyes on you, ~name~.

Join me, ~name~.

♫ Four, five, six majestic steeds flying in a row. ♫

Wow, I can see a lot of intensity in your... hands.

That's distracting.
Having fun, ~name~?

Oh, ~name~...

That was lovely, Florina. I’m so proud of you!

Bravo!
That was hot, ~name~!
Hey, is it over?
After that display of technique, I'm guessing your masturbation skills rank is "S".
I loved the show. When is the second act?
That was super hot, ~name~.
After that display of technique, I'm guessing your masturbation skill rank is "S".

Hm? Wha–!? Eeek!
So, I guess it's game over for you.
That was lovely... Invigorating, even.

Seeing you going at it was pretty darn hot.
Someone's dirty.
That was a fine show, ~name~.
I'm glad you came, that was hot.
You're all dirty now. Need a hand washing?
That was quite the explosion.
It sounded like you were having a lot of fun!
Was that as fun as it looked?
Done already?
You're so dirty... Can I help you clean up? You can clean me up too, i-if you want...

I'm glad you came... Wait I didn't mean it like that.
Easy there, Florina. I knew the rules and I lost, fair and square.
You won! Alright, I'm a woman of my word... Give me a second, please...
Do I really have to?
I lost. As a Sacaen I always keep my promises, so I'll do it.
What? Hold on! Wait just a minute!
Easy there, Florina. I knew the rules and I lost, fair and square.
You brought me here hoping this would happen, right?
You won! Alright, I'm a woman of my word... Give me a second, please...
This is the first time I've explored myself *cough*-in public-*cough*.
I don't know why, but I think this could be a lot of fun.

Hello there, my love...
Look at me, sweetie!

scene.directive: Despite being defeated (and humiliated) at a game of poker, Lyn won something far more valuable: a new best friend.
Lyndis is excited to hear ~name~ is coming for a visit.
~name~! Over here! I'm so glad you could make it.
Today we are visiting a dear friend of mine.
We are going to give her a birthday present.
Here we are!
Great! It looks like she's home.
Make yourself comfortable, ~name~.
Lady Lyndis?
Florina!
Lyn! I thought I heard your voice.
Happy birthday!
EEEKKK! Who's this?
Oh, her? She's ~name~. Don't worry, she's a good friend of mine.
N-nice to meet you... I-I am Florina.
T-thank you for wishing me a happy birthday, Lyn.
Florina is very shy about men. She's never even been kissed by one.
L-Lyn!!!
Don't worry, Florina. You haven't missed a thing. Girls are much more fun to fool around with, anyway...
Really?
And we are here to give you your birthday present! Right, ~name~...?
The three of us are gonna kiss and have fun exploring our bodies...
Are you s-sure about this?
Yeah, this should be fun! Right, ~name~?
~name~? You too?
O-okay. I trust you, Lyn.
If you say this is fun, I'll do it.
Plus, ~name~ is very beautiful.
YES!!!
Hurry up, ~name~! Get naked already!
Y-yes, ~name~!
All right! let's do this. Now get your cute butt over here and kiss me, ~name~!
After being defeated (and humiliated) for the first time, Lyn, without knowing why,
instantly felt she had met the man of her dreams. Upon invitation of Lady Lyndis herself
you plan to visit her home...
Hi, ~name~, I'm so glad you decided to come.
I was so nervous. When I invited you I thought I was going to die.
But here you are... here we are.
These are the Sacaen plains. My home.
I was raised here, and when the time comes, I'd like to have a family here.
No... I'm not asking you to be the father of my children.
(Although you would be a really good candidate...)
Look, the point is, here I can be myself.
That day, when we were playing, I was so nervous.
... And the weird thing is that I never get nervous!
It was all your fault!
When I saw you, I lost focus.
Your personality captivated me.
And you're not hard to look at, either...
I couldn't believe how easily you defeated me!
That was the very first time I exposed my naked body...
and the first time I touched myself in public...
and my very first orgasm...
and... you witnessed all of it!
I can't even remember if I got to see your bare chest!
T-to be honest, I've done some things already...
Like, you know... with my mouth...
But I've never had sex before!
And I've always dreamt of having my first time on the Sacaen plains,
with Mother Earth and Father Sky watching,
with someone special...
... and you're special to me, ~name~!
Close your eyes now...
[----- Your support level has grown to XXX -----]
What do you say?
You accept? Well, I wouldn't take "no" for an answer from you, anyway, ~name~!
